verses.text: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* wait alone \w in|strong="H5921"\w* silence \w for|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w From|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* comes \w my|strong="H1732"\w* help.

Yes, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* rock, \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w help|strong="H3444"\w*, \w my|strong="H4480"\w* retreat, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* shaken \w too|strong="H4480"\w* sorely.

\w How|strong="H3444"\w* \w long|strong="H7227"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, all \w of|strong="H6697"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, batter \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man, as \w one|strong="H3808"\w* might \w a|strong="H3068"\w* leaning wall?

\w From|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* height \w they|strong="H5921"\w* are planning \w to|strong="H5704"\w* topple \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* take pleasure \w in|strong="H5921"\w* falsehood; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* bless \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* mouth, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* inwardly \w they|strong="H5921"\w* curse. \qs Selah\qs*
\w I|strong="H7613"\w* wait alone \w in|strong="H7130"\w* silence \w for|strong="H7130"\w* God; \w for|strong="H7130"\w* from \w him|strong="H7130"\w* comes \w my|strong="H7130"\w* hope.

\w Yes|strong="H3588"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* rock, \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w help|strong="H4480"\w*, \w my|strong="H3588"\w* retreat, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* shaken \w too|strong="H4480"\w* sorely.

\w On|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H6697"\w* rests \w my|strong="H3808"\w* honour \w and|strong="H6697"\w* safety, \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H6697"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w strong|strong="H6697"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4869"\w*.

\w Trust|strong="H4268"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* people assembled, pour \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w*; \w God|strong="H6697"\w* \w is|strong="H3519"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* lowly \w are|strong="H5971"\w* nought \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* breath, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lofty \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* illusion: \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* balances \w up|strong="H8210"\w* \w they|strong="H6256"\w* \w go|strong="H5971"\w*, \w they|strong="H6256"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* lighter \w than|strong="H3605"\w* breath \w altogether|strong="H3605"\w*.

Trust \w not|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* gain \w of|strong="H1121"\w* extortion, \w set|strong="H5927"\w* \w no|strong="H5927"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w* hopes \w in|strong="H1121"\w* robbery. \w As|strong="H5927"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* wealth, \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w* bears fruit, \w set|strong="H5927"\w* \w not|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H5927"\w* heart \w upon|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w One|strong="H3588"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* God \w has|strong="H3820"\w* uttered, two things there \w are|strong="H3820"\w* \w which|strong="H2428"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w power|strong="H2428"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H3820"\w* God,

\w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, too, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, belongs kindness; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* requite \w each|strong="H8147"\w* \w person|strong="H1696"\w* according \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w what|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1696"\w* done.
